title: Honoring Danielle Sullivan and Chris Hembach as graduates of Charles Water Karate and Fitness upon the occasion of their receiving Black Belt certificates
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Danielle Sullivan and Chris Hembach as
graduates of Charles Water Karate and Fitness upon the occasion of their
receiving Black Belt certificates

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body  to  commend  and  pay
tribute  to those youth of today and leaders of tomorrow whose character
and achievements best exemplify the ideals and values cherished by  this
great State and Nation; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is also the custom of this Legislative Body to recognize
the dedication and commitment of our  young  people  who,  by  achieving
outstanding  success in their endeavors, have inspired and brought pride
to our majestic Empire State, and  who  distinguish  themselves  through
excellence and accomplishment; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Danielle Sullivan and Chris Hembach as graduates of Charles Water Karate
and  Fitness  upon  the  occasion  of their receiving Black Belt certif-
icates; and
  WHEREAS, Charles Water Karate and Fitness in Williston Park, New York,
is a full time, professional martial arts school, with classes for chil-
dren, adults and teenagers; the school is the only one  on  Long  Island
that also offers Karatotot, a program specifically designed for children
four and a half to six years of age; and
  WHEREAS, The goal of Charles Water Karate and Fitness is to facilitate
mental growth, enabling its students to reach their highest potential as
human  beings;  it teaches students how to defend themselves responsibly
while  instilling  self-confidence,  self-discipline  and  respect   for
others; and
  WHEREAS, In December 2010, Charles Water Karate and Fitness celebrated
its 27th Black Belt graduation ceremony; and
  WHEREAS,  Danielle  Sullivan  and Chris Hembach of Williston Park, New
York, successfully passed their examinations in July 2010  and  received
their  Black  Belt certificates from Charles Water Karate and Fitness in
December 2010; they are 2nd Degree Black Belts; and
  WHEREAS, It is appropriate to celebrate the successful  endeavors  and
accomplishments of remarkable youth in this great Empire State; Danielle
Sullivan  and  Chris  Hembach  are indeed such remarkable New York State
youth; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Danielle Sullivan and Chris Hembach as graduates of Charles Water
Karate and Fitness upon the  occasion  of  receiving  their  Black  Belt
certificates,  and to extend to them the best wishes of this Legislative
Body for a future of purposeful success and well-being, fully  confident
of  their  response  to a promising future and appreciative of the model
they represent for all aspiring young people of the Empire State; and be
it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Danielle Sullivan and  Chris  Hembach,  Williston  Park,  New
York, and to Charles Water Karate and Fitness, Williston Park, New York.
